pattern.title: External element use has data definition

rule.context: xs:element[ some $ref-namespace in namespace-uri-from-QName(resolve-QName(@ref, .)) satisfies nf:get-document-element(.)/self::xs:schema//xs:import[ xs:anyURI(@namespace) = $ref-namespace and @appinfo:externalImportIndicator]]
rule.assert: Rule 9-55: An external attribute use MUST be a documented component with a non-empty data definition.
